resources.string: Please, type the title of RSS-source to save it
Please, check the URL. It seems to be incorrect or empty
Could not save RSS-source. Please, try again
Could not find any RSS feeds. You can add some with a drawer menu on the left
You have unsubscribed from %1$s RSS-channel updates.
Hey, performance matters. We have set a limit for active feeds to subscribe to 7 to keep your device safe from performance issue and huge amount of network calls.
Unfortunately, no news have been found in this channel
Please, keep in mind that as the next session starts you will not see this feed on application\'s home screen
